title: Enacts the New York birth-related neurological impairment compensation act
summary: Enacts the New York birth-related neurological injury compensation act; directs the workers' compensation board to determine all claims for compensation for birth-related impairment, and if the injury falls within the defined scope of neurological injuries, direct compensation by the fund, similar to a no fault system.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to enacting the New York birth-related neurological injury compensation act
